snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg said Brooklyn College should be free to sponsor a forum on any topic, “including ideas that people find repugnant.”
abstract: New York Mayor Michael R Bloomberg defends Brooklyn College's decision to co-sponsor a panel discussion with Boycott, Divestment and Sanctions, or BDS, which is calling for economic boycotts and sanctions against Israel; Bloomberg, a longtime vocal supporter of Israel, is also a frequent advocate of free speech and says that it is the university's decision to make.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg said Brooklyn College should be free to sponsor a forum on any topic, “including ideas that people find repugnant.”

headline.seo: Bloomberg Defends Brooklyn College’s Decision to B.D.S. Talk
headline.main: Mayor Backs College’s Plan to Welcome Critics of Israel
